tedi dəun wɒnt tə [*] fındʒ [*] kʌt
to = to have; second element of cluster deleted in "fringe";
lulu teık ıt ɒf wəʊn ʃi
voiceless lateral alveolar fricative replaced by voiceless alveolar fricative and final consonant deleted in "shall"; second element of cluster deleted in "fringe";

ðæt kɑ:nt raıt tə du: ıt bæk tə frʌnt

after Jane says ɢhave a bath todayɦ

kæn aı hæv ə bʌɡi [*] ɡʌm
voiced bilabial plosive replaced by voiced velar plosive;
a kɑ:n pʊt ʌdə [*] ʃu ɒn

lɛt maı præm ɡəʊ ʌp dɛə
my = I'd; second element of cluster deleted in "draw";

g.ga: I don't like salt and pepper

u.a: maı [*] dəʊ [*] laık sɔʊt n̩ pɛıpə [*] nəʊ
my = I; final consonant cluster deleted in "dont"; vowel replaced by diphthong in "pepper";
voiced lateral approximant replaced by voiced alveolar lateral affricate;
mine = me; extra syllable inserted in "sandwich";
voiceless alveolar fricative omitted; voiced alveolar fricative replaced by voiced bilabial plosive;
tu lıtʊ dɒlız ə fɔlıŋ daʊn
voiced dental fricative replaced by voiced alveolar plosive;
